ing: 1 (2 liter) bottle lemon-lime flavored carbonated beverage
des: "Believe it or not, the party punch that people flip over is the easiest to make! Quit fooling with all those measurements and come on over to the easy side of the street! By the way, the French vanilla that always seems to taste the best in this punch are the cheap off-brands. Sounds like a line, but it's true!"
ins: Pour chilled punch and soda into punch bowl. Scoop out entire half-gallon of ice cream, and carefully slide into punch.
